lead_paragraph: The Swedish Football Association (svFF) disciplinary committee has awarded Malmo a 3-0 victory over Gothenburg after their Allsvenskan game was abandoned when home fans threw a firework at a visiting substitute.

headline.print_headline: Malmo Awarded 3-0 Win in Abandoned Gothenburg Match
headline.main: Malmo Awarded 3-0 Win in Abandoned Gothenburg Match
